name: Flo'Seki | Travellers
description:
Flo'Seki | Traveller

[Notices: The web version of the game may crash a short moment after death, use the downloadable versions if this happens]

Welcome to the world of Flo'Seki, in this fantastical setting you play as a traveller onboard of your very own Sky Ship. Explore and experience this new world and meet develop your name across the skies.

The game you see now is an arcade test version of the actual scope of the project.

Please do try out the core gameplay mechanic and get the highest score you can.  Also, have a feel for the game, is it too slow or hard, do leave your feedback here!

Tips/Guide: Apart from the in-game guide, quest will occasionally popup. To clear the Travel to: [x,y], use the smaller mini-map as a guide. Clearing quest will award you with more score and a slight healing or a power-up to your weapons

Gameplay Duration: 5-10 mins (avg per game)
